name: Absentia
description: After being declared dead in absentia, an FBI agent must reclaim her family, identity and innocence when she finds herself the prime suspect in a string of murders.

name: Once Upon a Time in Mexico
description: Hitman "El Mariachi" becomes involved in international espionage involving a psychotic CIA agent and a corrupt Mexican general.

name: Tales from the Crypt
description: Tales of horror based on the gruesome E.C. comic books of the 1950s presented by the legendary Crypt Keeper, a sinister ghoul obsessed with gallows humor and horrific puns.

name: Just Mercy
stars_name: Michael B. Jordan,Jamie Foxx,Brie Larson,Charlie Pye Jr.
description: World-renowned civil rights defense attorney Bryan Stevenson works to free a wrongly condemned death row prisoner.

name: Private Eyes
description: Former professional hockey player Matt Shade partners with private eye Angie Everett to solve crimes around Toronto.

name: Zola
description: A stripper named Zola embarks on a wild road trip to Florida.

name: Southpaw
description: After a fatal incident sends him on a rampant path of destruction, a champion boxer fights to get custody of his daughter and revive his professional career.

name: Richard Jewell
stars_name: Paul Walter Hauser,Sam Rockwell,Brandon Stanley,Ryan Boz
description: Security guard Richard Jewell is an instant hero after foiling a bomb attack at the 1996 Atlanta Olympics, but his life becomes a nightmare when the FBI leaks to the media that he is a suspect in the case.

name: Swordfish
description: A covert counter-terrorist unit called Black Cell led by Gabriel Shear wants the money to help finance their war against international terrorism, but it's all locked away. Gabriel brings in convicted hacker Stanley Jobson to help him.

name: Captain Phillips
description: The true story of Captain Richard Phillips and the 2009 hijacking by Somali pirates of the U.S.-flagged MV Maersk Alabama, the first American cargo ship to be hijacked in two hundred years.

name: Papillon
description: Wrongfully convicted for murder, Henri Charriere forms an unlikely relationship with fellow inmate and quirky convicted counterfeiter, Louis Dega, in an attempt to escape from the notorious penal colony on Devil's Island.

name: Manhunter
description: Former FBI profiler Will Graham returns to service to pursue a deranged serial killer dubbed "the Tooth Fairy" by the media.

name: Sacred Games
stars_name: Saif Ali Khan,Nawazuddin Siddiqui,Neeraj Kabi,Elnaaz Norouzi
description: A link in their pasts leads an honest cop to a fugitive gang boss, whose cryptic warning spurs the officer on a quest to save Mumbai from cataclysm.

name: In the Name of the Father
description: A man's coerced confession to an I.R.A. bombing he did not commit results in the imprisonment of his father as well. An English lawyer fights to free them.

name: Pretty Hard Cases
stars_name: Meredith MacNeill,Adrienne C. Moore,Al Mukadam,Daren A. Herbert
description: "Pretty Hard Cases" follows Guns and Gangs detective Sam and Drug Squad detective Kelly. By day, they are heroes in their particular way: skilled, tough, determined, and entertaining, fighting to do good in a broken system.

name: Snowdrop
description: Adapted from the handwritten notes of a man who escaped from a political prison camp in North Korea, Snowdrop is set against the backdrop of the 1987 Democracy Movement in South Korea.

name: Trigger Point
description: Drama series following Lana Washington, an experienced bomb disposal officer working for the Metropolitan Police.

name: Traffic
stars_name: Michael Douglas,Benicio Del Toro,Catherine Zeta-Jones,Jacob Vargas
description: A conservative judge is appointed by the President to spearhead America's escalating war against drugs, only to discover that his teenage daughter is a crack addict. Two DEA agents protect an informant. A jailed drug baron's wife attempts to carry on the family business.

name: For Life
description: A prisoner becomes a lawyer and fights to overturn his life sentence for a crime he didn't commit.

name: The Borgias
description: In the fifteenth century, Pope Alexander VI tries to control all power in Italy with the help of his several sons, through murder, intrigue, war, and marriage alliances.

name: Inherent Vice
description: In 1970, drug-fueled Los Angeles private investigator Larry "Doc" Sportello investigates the disappearance of a former girlfriend.

name: City of Lies
description: Russell Poole and Jack Jackson investigate the murder of rapper Notorious B.I.G.

name: Fracture
description: An attorney intending on climbing the career ladder toward success finds an unlikely opponent in a manipulative criminal he is trying to prosecute.

name: Airheads
description: Three band members hoping for a big break head to a radio station to play their demo tape and wind up holding everyone hostage with plastic guns when the head D.J. refuses to play them.

name: We Hunt Together
description: A gripping twist on a classic cat-and-mouse story, this British drama series explores the intoxication of sexual attraction and the dangerous power of emotional manipulation as two conflicted detectives track down a pair of deadly killers.

name: Menace II Society
stars_name: Tyrin Turner,Larenz Tate,June Kyoto Lu,Toshi Toda
description: A young street hustler attempts to escape the rigors and temptations of the ghetto in a quest for a better life.

name: Synchronic
description: Two New Orleans paramedics' lives are ripped apart after they encounter a series of horrific deaths linked to a designer drug with bizarre, otherworldly effects.

name: Dr. Death
description: As patients entering the operating room of Dr. Christopher Duntsch for routine spinal surgeries start leaving permanently maimed or end up dead, two fellow surgeons and a young Assistant District Attorney set out to stop him.

name: American Gigolo
stars_name: Richard Gere,Lauren Hutton,Hector Elizondo,Nina van Pallandt
description: A Los Angeles male escort, who mostly caters to an older female clientèle, is accused of a murder which he did not commit.

name: Get Hard
description: When millionaire James King is jailed for fraud and bound for San Quentin, he turns to Darnell Lewis to prep him to go behind bars.

name: Third Watch
description: The exploits of a group of men and women who serve New York City as police officers, firemen, and paramedics in the fictional 55th Precinct.

name: Almost Human
description: In a not-so-distant future, a human cop and an android partner team up to protect and serve.

name: Midnight Run
stars_name: Robert De Niro,Charles Grodin,Yaphet Kotto,John Ashton
description: A bounty hunter pursues a former Mafia accountant who is also being chased by a rival bounty hunter, the F.B.I., and his old mob boss after jumping bail.

name: Wall Street
description: A young and impatient stockbroker is willing to do anything to get to the top, including trading on illegal inside information taken through a ruthless and greedy corporate raider who takes the youth under his wing.

name: The Serpent
description: The twisting, real-life story of Charles Sobhraj, a murderer, thief and seductive master of disguise, who was a hidden darkness in the mid-70's on Asia's hippie trail.

name: Chopper
description: Chopper tells the intense story of Mark "Chopper" Read, a legendary criminal who wrote his autobiography while serving a jail sentence in prison. His book, "From the Inside", upon which the film is based, was a best-seller.

name: Seven Psychopaths
description: A struggling screenwriter inadvertently becomes entangled in the Los Angeles criminal underworld after his oddball friends kidnap a gangster's beloved Shih Tzu.

name: The Accused
description: After a young woman suffers a brutal gang rape in a bar one night, a prosecutor assists in bringing the perpetrators to justice, including the ones who encouraged and cheered on the attack.

name: Raising Arizona
description: When a childless couple of an ex-con and an ex-cop decide to help themselves to one of another family's quintuplets, their lives become more complicated than they anticipated.

name: Ocean's Thirteen
description: Danny Ocean rounds up the boys for a third heist after casino owner Willy Bank double-crosses one of the original eleven, Reuben Tishkoff.

name: Entrapment
description: An insurance agent is sent by her employer to track down and help capture an art thief.

name: The Devil's Rejects
stars_name: Sid Haig,Sheri Moon Zombie,Bill Moseley,William Forsythe
description: The murderous, backwoods Firefly family take to the road to escape the vengeful Sheriff Wydell, who is not afraid of being as ruthless as his target.

name: Once Were Warriors
description: A family descended from Maori warriors is bedeviled by a violent father and the societal problems of being treated as outcasts.

name: Persona
description: A man diagnosed with Alzheimer's decides to punish criminals.

name: Four Brothers
description: When their adoptive mother is gunned down in a store robbery, four brothers decide to investigate the murder and find the killers themselves, but not all is what it seems.

name: Medium
description: Suburban mom Allison DuBois attempts to balance family life with solving mysteries using her special gift. The dead send her visions of their deaths or other crimes while she sleeps.

name: Chungking Express
stars_name: Brigitte Lin,Takeshi Kaneshiro,Tony Chiu-Wai Leung,Faye Wong
description: Two melancholy Hong Kong policemen fall in love: one with a mysterious female underworld figure, the other with a beautiful and ethereal waitress at a late-night restaurant he frequents.

name: Patriots Day
description: The story of the 2013 Boston Marathon bombing and the aftermath, which includes the city-wide manhunt to find the terrorists responsible.

name: Metástasis
description: A Colombian remake of the U.S. TV show Breaking Bad. After he is diagnosed with cancer, Walter Blanco teams up with José Miguel Rosas to manufacture and sell crystal meth.

name: Inspector George Gently
description: With the help of DS John Bacchus, Inspector George Gently spends his days bringing to justice members of the criminal underworld who are unfortunate enough to have the intrepid investigator assigned to their cases.

name: Landscapers
description: A devoted and mild-mannered British couple become the focus of an extraordinary investigation when two dead bodies are discovered in the back garden of a house in England.

name: The French Connection
stars_name: Gene Hackman,Roy Scheider,Fernando Rey,Tony Lo Bianco
description: A pair of NYPD detectives in the Narcotics Bureau stumble onto a heroin smuggling ring based in Marseilles, but stopping them and capturing their leaders proves an elusive goal.

name: End of Watch
description: Shot documentary-style, this film follows the daily grind of two young police officers in LA who are partners and friends, and what happens when they meet criminal forces greater than themselves.

name: Machete Kills
description: The U.S. government recruits Machete to battle his way through Mexico in order to take down an arms dealer who looks to launch a weapon into space.

name: Mortdecai
description: Juggling angry Russians, the British Mi5, and an international terrorist, debonair art dealer and part-time rogue Charlie Mortdecai races to recover a stolen painting rumored to contain a code that leads to lost gold.

name: Taken 3
description: Accused of a ruthless murder he never committed or witnessed, Bryan Mills goes on the run and brings out his particular set of skills to find the true killer and clear his name.

name: Pagan Peak
stars_name: Julia Jentsch,Nicholas Ofczarek,Franz Hartwig,Dominic Marcus Singer
description: German Officer Stocker and cynical, uncommitted Austrian Inspector Winter work together to catch a serial killer who leaves messages and stylizes himself as Krampus, a folkloric demonic creature that must punish society for its sins.

name: Boys Don't Cry
stars_name: Hilary Swank,Chloë Sevigny,Peter Sarsgaard,Brendan Sexton III
description: A young man named Brandon Teena navigates love, life, and being transgender in rural Nebraska.

name: The Glades
description: A former Chicago cop moves to a small Florida town and joins the state police.

name: Out of Time
description: A Florida police chief must solve a vicious double homicide before he himself falls under suspicion.

name: Twins
description: A physically perfect but innocent man goes in search of his long-lost twin brother, who is short, a womanizer, and small-time crook.

name: The Basketball Diaries
description: A teenager finds his dreams of becoming a basketball star threatened after he free falls into the harrowing world of drug addiction.

name: Funny Games
description: Two violent young men take a mother, father, and son hostage in their vacation cabin and force them to play sadistic "games" with one another for their own amusement.

name: Masterminds
description: A guard at an armored car company in the Southern U.S. organizes one of the biggest bank heists in American history. Based on the October 1997 Loomis Fargo robbery.

name: Crank
stars_name: Jason Statham,Amy Smart,Carlos Sanz,Jose Pablo Cantillo
description: Professional assassin Chev Chelios learns his rival has injected him with a poison that will kill him if his heart rate drops.

name: I See You
description: Strange occurrences plague a small town detective and his family as he investigates the disappearance of a young boy.

name: Out of the Furnace
description: When Rodney Baze mysteriously disappears and law enforcement doesn't follow through fast enough, his older brother, Russell, takes matters into his own hands to find justice.

name: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
description: Series of unrelated short stories covering elements of crime, horror, drama, and comedy about people of different backgrounds committing murders, suicides, thefts, and other sorts of crime caused by certain motivations, perceived or not.

name: The Quarry
stars_name: Shea Whigham,Michael Shannon,Catalina Sandino Moreno,Bobby Soto
description: A drifter (Shea Whigham) kills a traveling preacher and takes his place at a small-town church, but the police chief (Michael Shannon) suspects foul play.

name: Bonnie and Clyde
stars_name: Warren Beatty,Faye Dunaway,Michael J. Pollard,Gene Hackman
description: Bored waitress Bonnie Parker falls in love with an ex-con named Clyde Barrow and together they start a violent crime spree through the country, stealing cars and robbing banks.

name: Believe Me: The Abduction of Lisa McVey
stars_name: Katie Douglas,David James Elliott,Rossif Sutherland,Amanda Arcuri
description: On the night she plans on taking her own life, a 17-year-old girl is kidnapped and finds herself fighting to stay alive. She gets released, but when she returns home, no one believes her story except for one detective.

name: The Guardian
description: Nick Fallin is a hotshot lawyer working at his father's ultrasuccessful Pittsburgh law firm. Unfortunately, the high life has gotten the best of Nick.

name: The Drop
description: Bob Saginowski finds himself at the center of a robbery gone awry and entwined in an investigation that digs deep into the neighborhood's past where friends, families, and foes all work together to make a living - no matter the cost.

name: La Haine
stars_name: Vincent Cassel,Hubert Koundé,Saïd Taghmaoui,Abdel Ahmed Ghili
description: 24 hours in the lives of three young men in the French suburbs the day after a violent riot.

name: Kin
stars_name: Charlie Cox,Clare Dunne,Aidan Gillen,Emmett J Scanlan
description: Kin tells the story of a fictional Dublin family embroiled in gangland war and speaks to the enduring unbreakable bonds of blood and family.

name: All Good Things
description: David Marks, a real estate scion, is suspected of killing his wife Katie, who disappeared in 1982.

name: Monsieur Verdoux
description: A suave but cynical man supports his family by marrying and murdering rich women for their money, but the job has some occupational hazards.

name: Nikita
description: A rogue assassin returns to take down the secret organization that trained her.

name: Fallen Angels
description: This Hong Kong-set crime drama follows the lives of a hitman, hoping to get out of the business, and his elusive female partner.

name: Ghost in the Shell
description: In the near future, Major Mira Killian is the first of her kind: A human saved from a terrible crash, who is cyber-enhanced to be a perfect soldier devoted to stopping the world's most dangerous criminals.

name: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid
description: Wyoming, early 1900s. Butch Cassidy and The Sundance Kid are the leaders of a band of outlaws. After a train robbery goes wrong they find themselves on the run with a posse hard on their heels. Their solution - escape to Bolivia.

name: Awake
description: A wealthy young man undergoing heart transplant surgery discovers that the surgical team intend to murder him.

name: A Walk Among the Tombstones
description: Private investigator Matthew Scudder is hired by a drug kingpin to find out who kidnapped and murdered his wife.

name: Jai Bhim
description: When a tribal man is arrested for a case of alleged theft, his wife turns to a human-rights lawyer to help bring justice.
A simple yet proud farmer in the year 1922 conspires to murder his wife for financial gain, convincing his teenage son to assist. But their actions have unintended consequences.

name: No Way Out
description: A coverup and witchhunt occur after a politician accidentally kills his mistress.

name: ZeroZeroZero
stars_name: Andrea Riseborough,Dane DeHaan,Giuseppe De Domenico,Harold Torres
description: A cocaine shipment makes its way to Europe, starting from the moment a powerful cartel of Italian criminals decides to buy it, to its journeys through Mexico, to its shipment across the Atlantic Ocean.

name: Be Cool
description: Disenchanted with the movie industry, Chili Palmer tries the music industry, meeting and romancing a widow of a music executive on the way.

name: Body of Proof
description: Medical examiner Megan Hunt's unique approach to solving crimes puts her at odds with her superiors.

name: Cool Hand Luke
description: A laid back Southern man is sentenced to two years in a rural prison, but refuses to conform.

name: You Were Never Really Here
description: A traumatized veteran unafraid of violence tracks down missing girls for a living. When a job spins out of control, Joe's nightmares overtake him as a conspiracy is uncovered leading to what could be his death trip or his awakening.

name: Panic Room
description: A divorced woman and her diabetic daughter take refuge in their newly-purchased house's safe room, when three men break-in, searching for a missing fortune.

name: Havoc
description: Two affluent suburban girls clash with the Latino gang culture of East Los Angeles.

name: Alias Grace
description: In 19th-century Canada, a psychiatrist weighs whether a murderess should be pardoned due to insanity.

name: M
description: When the police in a German city are unable to catch a child-murderer, other criminals join in the manhunt.

name: Sexy Beast
description: Brutal gangster Don Logan recruits "retired" safecracker Gal for one last job, but it goes badly for both of them.

name: Night Teeth
stars_name: Jorge Lendeborg Jr.,Debby Ryan,Lucy Fry,Raúl Castillo
description: A college student moonlighting as a chauffeur picks up two mysterious women for a night of party-hopping across LA. But when he uncovers their bloodthirsty intentions - and their dangerous, shadowy underworld - he must fight to stay alive.

name: Ófærð
stars_name: Ólafur Darri Ólafsson,Ilmur Kristjánsdóttir,Björn Hlynur Haraldsson,Guðjón Pedersen
description: In a remote town in Iceland, Police desperately try to solve a crime as a powerful storm descends upon the town.

name: S.W.A.T.
stars_name: Samuel L. Jackson,Colin Farrell,Michelle Rodriguez,LL Cool J
description: An imprisoned drug kingpin offers a huge cash reward to anyone that can break him out of police custody, and only the L.A.P.D.'s Special Weapons and Tactics team can prevent it.

name: Rush Hour 2
description: Carter and Lee head to Hong Kong for a vacation, but become embroiled in a counterfeit money scam.

name: Project Power
description: When a pill that gives its users unpredictable superpowers for five minutes hits the streets of New Orleans, a teenage dealer and a local cop must team with an ex-soldier to take down the group responsible for its creation.

name: Rounders
description: A young, reformed gambler must return to playing big stakes poker to help a friend pay off loan sharks, while balancing his relationship with his girlfriend and his commitments to law school.

name: Super
description: After his wife falls under the influence of a drug dealer, an everyday guy transforms himself into Crimson Bolt, a superhero with the best intentions, but lacking in heroic skills.

name: Klute
description: A small-town detective searching for a missing man has only one lead: a connection with a New York prostitute.

name: Ride Along
description: Security guard Ben must prove himself to his girlfriend's brother, top police officer James. He rides along James on a 24-hour patrol of Atlanta.

name: Domino
description: A recounting of Domino Harvey's life story. The daughter of actor Laurence Harvey turned away from her career as a Ford model to become a bounty hunter.

name: Baptiste
description: Mercurial retired police detective Julien Baptiste specializes in missing-persons cases.

name: Date Night
stars_name: Steve Carell,Tina Fey,Mark Wahlberg,Taraji P. Henson
description: In New York City, a case of mistaken identity turns a bored married couple's attempt at a glamorous and romantic evening into something more thrilling and dangerous.

name: Shaft
stars_name: Samuel L. Jackson,Jessie T. Usher,Richard Roundtree,Regina Hall
description: JJ Shaft, a cyber security expert with a degree from MIT, enlists his family's help to uncover the truth behind his best friend's untimely death.

name: John Q
description: John Quincy Archibald takes a hospital emergency room hostage when his insurance won't cover his son's heart transplant.

name: Chip 'n Dale: Rescue Rangers
description: Disney's fun-loving chipmunks are re-imagined as the leaders of a team of pint-sized crime-fighters.

name: 48 Hrs.
description: A hard-nosed cop reluctantly teams up with a wise-cracking criminal temporarily paroled to him in order to track down a killer.

name: Kung Fury 2
description: The story will focus on Kung Fury's universe with no real connection to the short movie other than the lead character.

name: EastEnders
stars_name: Adam Woodyatt,Steve McFadden,Pam St. Clement,Letitia Dean
description: The everyday lives of working-class inhabitants of Albert Square, a traditional Victorian square of terrace houses surrounding a park in the East End of London's Walford borough. The square includes the Queen Vic pub and a street market.

name: The Highwaymen
stars_name: Kevin Costner,Woody Harrelson,Kathy Bates,John Carroll Lynch
description: The untold true story of the legendary detectives who brought down Bonnie and Clyde.

name: The Thomas Crown Affair
description: A very rich and successful playboy amuses himself by stealing artwork, but may have met his match in a seductive detective.

name: Play Motel
stars_name: Ray Lovelock,Anna Maria Rizzoli,Mario Cutini,Antonella Antinori
description: A reporter and his girlfriend investigate deaths surrounding a hotel where several prominent people go to have sex.

name: Bronson
description: A young man who was sentenced to seven years in prison for robbing a post office ends up spending three decades in solitary confinement. During this time, his own personality is supplanted by his alter-ego, Charles Bronson.

name: StartUp
description: A desperate banker, a Haitian-American gang lord and a Cuban-American hacker are forced to work together to unwittingly create their version of the American dream - organized crime 2.0.

name: Double Indemnity
stars_name: Fred MacMurray,Barbara Stanwyck,Edward G. Robinson,Byron Barr
description: A Los Angeles insurance representative lets an alluring housewife seduce him into a scheme of insurance fraud and murder that arouses the suspicion of his colleague, an insurance investigator.

name: 22 Jump Street
description: After making their way through high school (twice), big changes are in store for officers Schmidt and Jenko when they go deep undercover at a local college.

name: Aurora Teagarden Mysteries
stars_name: Candace Cameron Bure,Marilu Henner,Ellie Harvie,Peter Benson
description: Aurora/Roe, a librarian and amateur sleuth, investigates and solves murders with help from her friends in Real Murders Club.

name: Top of the Lake
stars_name: Elisabeth Moss,David Wenham,Peter Mullan,Thomas M. Wright
description: Obsessed with the disappearance of a 12-year-old pregnant girl near a freezing lake in New Zealand, a brave detective will find herself up against small-town secrets and a side of herself that was meticulously kept at bay.

name: Al Hayba
description: In a village by the Lebanon-Syria border, the head of an arms-smuggling clan contends with family conflicts, power struggles and complicated love.

name: Mannix
description: Mannix worked originally for Wickersham at Intertect and then struck out on his own, assisted by Peggy Fair (whose cop-husband had been killed) and Police Department contact Tobias.

name: Happy!
description: An injured hitman befriends his kidnapped daughter's imaginary friend; a perky blue flying unicorn.

name: Mouse
description: A suspenseful story that will center around the key question, "What if we could sort out psychopaths in advance?"

name: The Negotiator
stars_name: Samuel L. Jackson,Kevin Spacey,David Morse,Ron Rifkin
description: In a desperate attempt to prove his innocence, a skilled police negotiator accused of corruption and murder takes hostages in a government office to gain the time he needs to find the truth.

name: Escape from Alcatraz
description: Alcatraz is the most secure prison of its time. It is believed that no one can ever escape from it, until three daring men make a possibly successful attempt at escaping from one of the most infamous prisons in the world.

name: Chappie
description: In the near future, crime is patrolled by a mechanized police force. When one police droid, Chappie, is stolen and given new programming, he becomes the first robot with the ability to think and feel for himself.

name: My Son
description: Driving in the heart of the Highlands, Edmond Murray receives a call from his ex-wife, in tears. Their 7-year-old son went missing from a campsite. Soon it becomes clear that the child was kidnapped and the parents give way to despair.

name: My Blue Heaven
description: An all too uptight FBI agent must protect a larger than life mobster with a heart of gold, currently under witness protection in the suburbs.

name: R.I.P.D.
description: A recently slain cop joins a team of undead police officers working for the Rest in Peace Department and tries to find the man who murdered him.

name: In Plain Sight
description: U.S. Marshal Mary Shannon must hunt down witnesses for federal cases in the witness protection program while also managing a rather dysfunctional family and her own personal life.

name: Disturbia
description: A teen living under house arrest becomes convinced his neighbor is a serial killer.

name: Cardinal
description: Cardinal struggles to right past wrongs that could derail his investigation and end his career, as the case grows more violent and twisted and the clock ticks down on the killer's next victim.

name: The Batman: Deleted Arkham Scene
description: In a deleted scene from The Batman (2022), Batman consults an old acquaintance and Arkham inmate about The Riddler's crime spree.

name: Tidelands
description: After an ex-con returns to her fishing village, a dead body leads her to uncover the secrets of the town and its half-siren, half-human residents.

name: Out of Sight
description: A career bank robber breaks out of jail, and shares a moment of mutual attraction with a U.S. Marshal he has kidnapped.

name: The Tinder Swindler
stars_name: Simon Leviev,Cecilie Fjellhøy,Pernilla Sjöholm,Natalie Remøe Hansen
description: Posing as a wealthy, jet-setting diamond mogul, he wooed women online, then conned them out of millions of dollars. Now some victims plan for payback.

name: Happiest Season
description: A holiday romantic comedy that captures the range of emotions tied to wanting your family's acceptance, being true to yourself, and trying not to ruin Christmas by revealing a nasty secret.

name: Jonathan Creek
description: Jonathan Creek, a magician with a natural ability for solving puzzles, works from his home in a converted windmill. He uses his abilities to solve impossible crimes and mysterious murders.

name: Crossing Jordan
description: A "sexy, brilliant" Boston medical examiner. Despite a checkered career, Dr. Jordan Cavanaugh goes above and beyond to solve cases.

name: And Then There Were None
description: Ten strangers are invited to an island by a mysterious host, and start to get killed one by one. Could one of them be the killer?

name: The Ladykillers
description: Five oddball criminals planning a bank robbery rent rooms on a cul-de-sac from an octogenarian widow under the pretext that they are classical musicians.

name: Deception
description: An accountant is introduced to a mysterious sex club known as The List by his lawyer friend. But in this new world, he soon becomes the prime suspect in a woman's disappearance and a multi-million dollar heist.

name: Transporter 2
description: Transporter Frank Martin, surfaces in Miami, Florida and is implicated in the kidnapping of the young son of a powerful USA official.

name: The Heat
description: An uptight FBI Special Agent is paired with a foul-mouthed Boston cop to take down a ruthless drug lord.

name: On the Waterfront
stars_name: Marlon Brando,Karl Malden,Lee J. Cobb,Rod Steiger
description: An ex-prize fighter turned New Jersey longshoreman struggles to stand up to his corrupt union bosses, including his older brother, as he starts to connect with the grieving sister of one of the syndicate's victims.

name: The Judge
stars_name: Robert Downey Jr.,Robert Duvall,Vera Farmiga,Billy Bob Thornton
description: Big-city lawyer Hank Palmer returns to his childhood home where his father, the town's judge, is suspected of murder. Hank sets out to discover the truth and, along the way, reconnects with his estranged family.

name: The Night Clerk
stars_name: Tye Sheridan,Ana de Armas,Helen Hunt,John Leguizamo
description: A voyeuristic hotel clerk becomes the subject of a murder investigation.

name: I Stand Alone
description: A horse meat butcher's life and mind begins to break down as he lashes out against various factions of society while attempting to reconnect with his estranged daughter.

name: Blow Out
description: A movie sound recordist accidentally records the evidence that proves that a car accident was actually murder and consequently finds himself in danger.

name: Trom
description: After a missing animal rights activist is found amid a local whale hunt, journalist Hannis Martinsson risks his own skin on the trail of a spectacular story, sending shock waves through the isolated island community of the Faroes.

name: Dead Again
description: A woman who has lost her memory is taken in by a Los Angeles orphanage, and a private eye is enlisted to track down her identity, but he soon finds that he might have a past life connection to her that endangers their lives.

name: Murder on the Orient Express
description: In December 1935, when his transcontinental luxury train is stranded by deep snow, detective Hercule Poirot is called on to solve a murder that occurred in his car the night before, with a multitude of suspects.

name: The Brothers Grimsby
stars_name: Sacha Baron Cohen,Mark Strong,Rebel Wilson,Freddie Crowder
description: A new assignment forces a top spy to team up with his football hooligan brother.

name: American Rust
description: A compelling family drama that explores the tattered American dream through the eyes of complicated and compromised Chief of Police Del Harris in a Rust Belt town in southwest Pennsylvania.

name: The Avengers
description: A quirky spy show of the adventures of eccentrically suave British Agent John Steed and his predominately female partners.

name: Forbrydelsen
description: Police detective Sarah Lund investigates difficult cases with personal and political consequences.

name: Freedom Writers
description: A young teacher inspires her class of at-risk students to learn tolerance, apply themselves and pursue education beyond high school.

name: Spy Game
description: Retiring CIA agent Nathan Muir recalls his training of Tom Bishop while working against agency politics to free him from his Chinese captors.

name: Haven
description: Many in the coastal town of Haven, Maine have a dormant curse or "trouble" that could trigger at any time for any reason. FBI agent Audrey Parker, the sheriff and the town's black sheep must deal with the troubles' deadly effects.

name: The Losers
stars_name: Idris Elba,Zoe Saldana,Jeffrey Dean Morgan,Chris Evans
description: A CIA special forces team is betrayed and left for dead by their superiors, galvanizing them to mount an offensive on the CIA.

name: Doing Time
description: This prison comedy is based on the popular British television series of the same name. Long time Slade prison inmate Fletcher is ordered by Grouty to arrange a football match between the ...                See full summary »

description: No one knows who invented Panic or when it first began. But in the forgotten rural town of Carp, Texas, the game is the only way out. Every summer the graduating seniors risk their lives competing in a series of challenges that force them to confront their deepest fears for the chance to win life-changing money. Anyone can play. Only one will win. Let the games begin.

description: Crownies follows five young solicitors fresh out of law school as they face the pressures and madness of modern single life - in a fast paced workplace that highlights the moral dilemmas ...                See full summary »

description: Add a Plot

description: Add a Plot

name: Black Money Love
description: Omar is a police officer. After the death of his fiancé he suffers great pain. Sibel, Omar's fiancée's body was found on the top of a cliff, in a car next to a fairly old, rich business man. After the shock of her sudden death and the accusations of his love cheating on him, Omar realizes that there is more behind her suspicious murder.

name: Blue Heelers

name: The Alfred Hitchcock Hour
description: A continuation of the dramatic anthology series Alfred Hitchcock Presents (1955) hosted by the Master of Suspense and Mystery.

name: Bandidas
description: In turn-of-the-century Mexico, two very different women become a bank-robbing duo in an effort to combat a ruthless enforcer terrorizing their town.

name: Derailed
description: When two married business executives having an affair are blackmailed by a violent criminal, the two must turn the tables on him to save their families.

name: Notorious
description: The life and death story of The Notorious B.I.G. (a.k.a. Christopher Wallace), who came straight out of Brooklyn to take the world of rap music by storm.

name: Sea of Love
description: A detective investigating a series of murders becomes involved with a woman who may be the culprit.

name: Griselda
description: The life of Griselda Blanco, a devoted mother who created one of the most profitable cartels in history.

name: Roman J. Israel, Esq.
description: Roman J. Israel, Esq., a driven, idealistic defense attorney, finds himself in a tumultuous series of events that lead to a crisis and the necessity for extreme action.

name: HPI Haut Potentiel Intellectuel
description: Morgane has a 160 IQ but it never really helped her in her everyday life. The police decide to bring her on board to help them track down and catch highly intelligent criminals.

name: Now You See Me 3
description: A third installment of the 'Now You See Me' franchise. Plot undisclosed.

name: Escape Plan 2: Hades
description: Years after he fought his way out of an inescapable prison, Ray Breslin has organized a new top-notch security force. But when one of his team members goes missing, Breslin must return to the hell he once escaped from.

name: Suburbicon
description: As a 1950s suburban community self-destructs, a home invasion has sinister consequences for one seemingly normal family.

name: CSI: Cyber
stars_name: Patricia Arquette,James Van Der Beek,Shad Moss,Charley Koontz

name: Set It Off
stars_name: Jada Pinkett Smith,Queen Latifah,Vivica A. Fox,Kimberly Elise
description: Desperation drives four inner-city women to bank robbery in Los Angeles, then they start mistrusting each other.

name: Avengement

description: Jimmy's rare baseball card is robbed. Since it's his only hope to pay for his daughter's upcoming wedding, he recruits his cop partner Paul to track down the robber, a memorabilia-obsessed gangster.

name: Creep 2

name: Raw Deal
description: A former FBI agent turned small-town sheriff agrees to help the FBI chief infiltrate the Chicago mafia when the FBI chief's son is killed by them.

stars_name: Gary Sinise,Alana De La Garza,Daniel Henney,Tyler James Williams
description: An international unit of the FBI charged with coming to the aid of, and solving crimes involving, American citizens in foreign countries. A spin-off from Criminal Minds.

name: Ransom
stars_name: Luke Roberts,Brandon Jay McLaren,Nazneen Contractor,Sarah Greene
description: A team of crisis negotiators travels the globe to help multinational corporations and governmental agencies with complex negotiations and conflict resolution.

name: Frantic

name: The White Tiger
stars_name: Adarsh Gourav,Rajkummar Rao,Priyanka Chopra Jonas,Vedant Sinha

name: Mahkum

name: The Gunman
description: A sniper on a mercenary assassination team kills the minister of mines of the Congo. Terrier's successful kill shot forces him into hiding. Returning to the Congo years later, he becomes the target of a hit squad himself.

name: Supercool

description: Lifelong friends Neil and Gilbert's undeniable bond is tested to the limits when Neil makes a magical wish that comes true. With the assistance of Neil's charismatic neighbor, Jimmy, and Gilbert's wild ideas, Neil endures one epic night.

name: Narc

name: Taxi
description: To work off his tarnished driving record, a hip taxi driver must chauffeur a loser police inspector on the trail of German bank robbers.

name: True History of the Kelly Gang

name: In the Electric Mist
stars_name: Tommy Lee Jones,John Goodman,Peter Sarsgaard,Mary Steenburgen

name: Taxi
description: A mouthy and feisty taxicab driver has hot tips for a green and inept cop set on solving a string of New York City bank robberies committed by a quartet of female Brazilian bank robbers.

name: Aranyak
description: Political ploys, personal agendas and a beastly myth all surface as two mismatched hill station cops navigate a web of suspects after a puzzling murder.

description: John Gotti rises to head the powerful Gambino crime family before being convicted in 1992 of racketeering and murder.

name: Raatchasan

name: Following

name: Maniac

description: Years after walking away from her past as a young private eye, Veronica Mars gets pulled back to her hometown, just in time for her high school reunion, in order to help her old flame Logan Echolls, who's embroiled in a murder mystery.

stars_name: Gene Wilder,Richard Pryor,Georg Stanford Brown,JoBeth Williams

stars_name: Taye Diggs,Kathleen Robertson,Ian Anthony Dale,Raphael Sbarge
description: A single murder case is dissected from the committing of the crime through to the investigation, arrest and trial.

name: Home Sweet Home Alone

stars_name: Millie Davis,Sean Michael Kyer,Dalila Bela,Filip Geljo

description: Crook Johnny Clay assembles a five-man team to plan and execute a daring racetrack robbery.

name: Law & Order: UK

name: Locked Up
description: When an American teenager gets bullied at her school in Southeast Asia, she fights back--and gets sent to a reform school. But the "school" is more like a prison, and the young teenager ...                See full summary »

description: A look at the experiences of the members of the NXIVM, an organization and sex cult that made headlines for being charged with sex trafficking, racketeering, and conspiracy.

stars_name: Howard Charles,Sophia Del Pizzo,Kerry Godliman,Frances Barber

description: Don turns himself in and escapes with Vardhaan from prison, following which he recruits a team to steal currency printing plates from a bank in Berlin.

name: Des

name: Magic City

name: Blue Thunder

name: The Fanatic

name: American Animals

name: The Cleaner

name: El marginal

description: Judge Judy Sheindlin , a former judge from New York, tackles actual, small claims cases with her no-nonsense attitude in which damages of no more than $5,000 can be awarded.

name: American Me

name: Judy Justice

name: The Interpreter

name: Thunderheart
description: A young mixed-blood FBI agent is assigned to work with a cynical veteran investigator on a murder on a poverty-stricken Sioux reservation.

name: Vega$
description: Dan Tanna is a private investigator in the gambling town of Las Vegas, Nevada. Vegas can be seedy or glamorous, depending upon the point of view. This show is also notable for perhaps the ...                See full summary »

name: Angel
description: Molly, a high schooler, secretly earns her living as Angel, a street prostitute whose only family and friends are the ones she works with on the streets. She has to survive against a serial killer who is targeting people of her profession.

name: Money Monster

name: Quicksand
description: Maja, a student in Stockholm, finds herself on trial for murder after a tragedy at her school. More doubts and suspicions arise when new revelations are made.

name: The Score
description: Two small time crooks drive to a secluded cafe for a big 'score'.

name: Ashes to Ashes
description: After being shot in 2008 while investigating DCI Sam Tyler, DI Alex Drake wakes up in 1981.

name: Jett
description: World-class thief Daisy "Jett" Kowalski is just out of prison and already being forced back into what got her there, by a group of eccentric and dangerous criminals.

name: 12 Angry Men

description: Twelve men must decide the fate of one when one juror objects to the jury's decision.

name: You Get Me
stars_name: Bella Thorne,Halston Sage,Taylor John Smith,Nash Grier
description: A one night stand turns into a nightmare for a High School student, when the obsession of a young woman grows dangerous.

name: Bedrag
stars_name: Esben Smed,Thomas Hwan,Thomas Bo Larsen,Natalie Madueño
description: A big Danish sustainable energy company has had an enormous, suspect growth. Problems start, when an employee's body is found and cop detective Justesen starts investigating Energreen.

name: Bored to Death

name: Sympathy for Mr. Vengeance

name: The Captive

name: Night Stalker: The Hunt for a Serial Killer

name: Good Behavior
stars_name: Michelle Dockery,Juan Diego Botto,Terry Kinney,Lusia Strus
description: Letty Raines is a thief and con artist whose life is always one wrong turn, one bad decision, from implosion. Which is just how she likes it.

name: Heart of Stone
description: Plot kept under wraps. Described as a spy thriller.

name: County Line: All In
description: Sheriff Rockwell teams up with the new sheriff of York County, a young woman, to solve a murder that happened on the county line.

name: Bent
description: On his latest private investigation, a shamed former cop connects a murder case to a government conspiracy involving rogue agents from a top spy agency.

name: The Producers

name: Dare Me

description: The lives of several cheerleaders are changed forever when a shocking crime rocks their quiet suburban world.

name: Felon

name: Hostage

name: Snatch

name: Analyze That
stars_name: Robert De Niro,Billy Crystal,Lisa Kudrow,Joe Viterelli
description: Mobster Paul Vitti is released into Dr. Ben Sobol's care, where only more chaos ensues.

name: Mr. & Mrs. Smith
description: Series adaptation of the 2005 action film about married spies.

name: Jade

name: HIT

name: Freeway

name: RoboCop 3
stars_name: Robert John Burke,Nancy Allen,Mario Machado,Remy Ryan
description: Robocop saves the day once more. This time the half man/half robot takes on ruthless developers who want to evict some people on "their" land.

name: Reindeer Games
description: After assuming his dead cell-mate's identity to get with the other man's girlfriend, an ex-convict finds himself a reluctant participant in a casino heist.

name: Police Academy 5: Assignment: Miami Beach
description: The Police Academy's commandant will be honored at a police convention in Miami Beach. At the airport he picks a wrong bag with stolen diamonds. The "owners" want them back.

name: Rosario Tijeras
stars_name: Bárbara de Regil,Sebastian Martínez,Harold Azuara,José María de Tavira
description: The series tells the story of a warrior from one of the poorest and most dangerous neighborhoods in Mexico City, whose beauty and nobility contrast with the gray and desolate environment in...                See full summary »

name: Split Second
stars_name: Rutger Hauer,Kim Cattrall,Alastair Duncan,Michael J. Pollard
description: In a flooded future London, Detective Harley Stone hunts a serial killer who murdered his partner, and has haunted him ever since. He soon discovers what he is hunting might not be human.

name: Extracurricular
description: A model high school student who's steeped in a world of serious crime finds his double life upended when a classmate takes an interest in his secret.

name: Married to the Mob
description: A mobster's wife hates her lifestyle, but gets a chance to change it when her husband is killed - if the Long Island mob and the FBI let her.

name: Dangerous Davies: The Last Detective
description: When D. C. Dangerous Davies, not held in high regard by his superiors, is assigned to find a notorious criminal kingpin, he uncovers the details of 15 year old cold case.

name: The Punisher
stars_name: Dolph Lundgren,Louis Gossett Jr.,Jeroen Krabbé,Kim Miyori
description: When Frank Castle's family is murdered by criminals, he wages war on crime as a vigilante assassin known only as The Punisher.

name: The Sandhamn Murders
description: Viveca Sten's popular novels come to life in "The Sandhamn Murders", a perfect mix of Nordic crime and the beautiful surroundings of the outer Stockholm archipelago.

name: Showdown in Little Tokyo
description: Two L.A. cops with opposing views on what is the best way to uphold the law have to work together to bring down the Yakuza, while trying to protect a beautiful woman.

name: Mad Dog and Glory
stars_name: Robert De Niro,Uma Thurman,Bill Murray,David Caruso
description: When shy, soft-spoken Chicago detective Wayne "Mad Dog" Dobie inadvertently saves the life of local gangster Frank Milo, he's the reluctant recipient of an unusual one week "thank you" gift - a beautiful bartender named Glory.

name: Love/Hate
description: The story of the organized crime scene of Dublin is revealed, centered on Darren, who wants to stay out of trouble but ends up returning to his old habits and his old gang.

name: Impact
description: A unfaithful wife plots with her lover to kill her husband, but the lover is accidentally killed instead. The husband stays in hiding, and lets his wife be charged with conspiracy.

name: Brotherhood
description: Set in an Irish neighborhood in Providence, Rhode Island, the series revolves around two brothers on opposite sides of the law: one a gangster (Jason Isaacs) and the other a state politician (Jason Clarke).

name: Girl in the Box
description: In 1977, a girl is kidnapped and kept in a coffin-sized box. When her captors let her out, it's only to abuse her horribly. Will she ever escape?

name: The Good Nurse
description: An infamous caregiver is implicated in the deaths of hundreds of hospital patients.

name: The Invisible Guardian
description: A female inspector confronts a serial killer while dealing with the ghosts of her past.

name: The First 48
description: The series follows detectives during the hours immediately following a homicide.

name: The Heist of the Century
description: In 2006, a group of thieves performed what is considered one of the most famous and smart bank heists in the history of Argentina when they rob the Banco Río branch in Acassuso.

name: Boss
description: Mayor Tom Kane, diagnosed with a dementia disorder, struggles to keep his grip on power in Chicago.

name: The Protector
description: A young fighter named Kham must go to Australia to retrieve his stolen elephant. With the help of a Thai-born Australian detective, Kham must take on all comers, including a gang led by an evil woman and her two deadly bodyguards.

name: Loving Pablo
description: A journalist strikes up a romantic relationship with notorious drug lord Pablo Escobar.

name: Cyber Hell: Exposing an Internet Horror
description: Anonymous and exploitative, a network of online chat rooms ran rampant with sex crimes. The hunt to take down its operators required guts and tenacity.

name: Gandii Baat
stars_name: Kunwar Vikram Soni,Mridula Mahajan,Guru Haryani,Shravani Goswami
description: Scintillating stories of murder mysteries all under the genre of erotic thriller. With characters bordering on the psychopath tendencies, the stories this season dwell upon the plethora of emotions that prompt crimes of passion.

name: Secrets and Lies
description: Each series, a detective focuses on the prime suspect in a murder case; but everyone has something to hide.

name: CBGB
stars_name: Alan Rickman,Malin Akerman,Justin Bartha,Richard de Klerk
description: A look at the New York City punk-rock scene and the venerable nightclub, CBGB.

name: A Man Apart
description: A man known as Diablo emerges to head a drug cartel after the previous leader is imprisoned.

name: Saw V
description: Following Jigsaw's grisly demise, Mark Hoffman is commended as a hero, but Agent Strahm is suspicious, and delves into Hoffman's past. Meanwhile, another group of people are put through a series of gruesome tests.

name: Romeo Must Die
description: An avenging cop seeks out his brother's killer and falls for the daughter of a businessman who is involved in a money-deal with his father.

name: How to Steal a Million
description: The daughter of an art forger teams up with a burglar to steal one of her father's forgeries and protect his secret.

name: Deception
description: A famed magician uses his skills of deception to assist the FBI in solving high-profile cases.

name: Blood Ties
description: Two brothers on either side of the law face off over organized crime in Brooklyn during the 1970s.

name: Shadow of the Thin Man
description: A jockey has been shot dead at the race track. Famous detective Nick Charles and his wife Nora happen to be on the scene and Lt. Abrahams asks for Nick's expert help.

name: Les Misérables
description: Valjean, a former criminal, has atoned for his past and now finds himself in the midst of the French Revolution, avoiding a law-obsessed policeman hell-bent on capturing him.

name: American Night
stars_name: Jonathan Rhys Meyers,Emile Hirsch,Paz Vega,Jeremy Piven
description: A courier carrying Andy Warhol's famous "Pink Marilyn" arrives in New York City. Art and life collide - as John Kaplan tries to juggle the mob and his talent as an art forger with his love for Sarah Flores - and chaos ensues.

description: The killer known as Holiday continues to stalk the Falcone crime family while a new class of costumed criminal rises in Gotham City. Batman suspects that a former ally might be the serial killer.

name: Irrational Man
description: A tormented philosophy professor finds a will to live when he commits an existential act.

name: Blindspotting
stars_name: Jasmine Cephas Jones,Jaylen Barron,Candace Nicholas-Lippman,Benjamin Earl Turner
description: As Miles, Ashley's partner of 12 years and father of their son, is suddenly incarcerated, she is left to navigate a chaotic and humorous existential crisis when she's forced to move in with Miles' mother and half-sister.

name: The Stronghold
description: A police brigade working in the dangerous northern neighborhoods of Marseille, where the level of crime is higher than anywhere else in France.

name: Hustle & Flow
description: With help from his friends, a Memphis pimp in a mid-life crisis attempts to become a successful hip-hop emcee.

name: The Fifth Estate
stars_name: Benedict Cumberbatch,Daniel Brühl,Carice van Houten,Alicia Vikander
description: A dramatic thriller based on real events that reveals the quest to expose the deceptions and corruptions of power that turned an Internet upstart into the 21st century's most fiercely debated organization.

name: Pertaruhan: The Series

name: Ted Bundy: American Boogeyman
stars_name: Chad Michael Murray,Holland Roden,Jake Hays,Lin Shaye
description: The intrepid FBI agents Kathleen McChesney and Robert Ressler, organize one of the largest manhunt in history to apprehend America's most infamous serial killer, Ted Bundy.

name: Hell Drivers
description: A rookie trucker tries to expose his boss' rackets.

name: Remo Williams: The Adventure Begins
description: An officially "dead" cop is trained to become an extraordinary unique assassin in service of the US President.

name: Nothing to Lose
stars_name: Martin Lawrence,Tim Robbins,John C. McGinley,Giancarlo Esposito
description: Nick's wife's in bed with his boss. He later gets a gun to his head by a carjacker but steps on the gas pedal. They end up friends after adventures together - holdups, burglary, reckless driving, revenge etc. Twists follow.

name: I Am the Night
description: In early 1960s, a teenage girl looking for her real father and a disgraced journalist seeking closure find themselves drawn into a web of secrets revolving around L.A.'s most infamous cold case, the Black Dahlia (Elizabeth Short) murder.

name: Apt Pupil
description: A boy blackmails his neighbor after suspecting him to be a Nazi war criminal.

name: Devil in a Blue Dress
description: An African-American man is hired to find a woman, and gets mixed up in a murderous political scandal.

name: Broken City
description: In a city rife with injustice, ex-cop Billy Taggart seeks redemption and revenge after being double-crossed by its most powerful figure: Mayor Nicholas Hostetler.

name: Kommissar Rex
description: A recently-divorced cop adopts a police dog who lost his former companion; together they solve crimes in and around Vienna.

name: Chaos
description: Two cops, a rookie and a grizzled vet, pursue an accomplished bank robber.

name: Rolling Thunder
stars_name: William Devane,Tommy Lee Jones,Linda Haynes,James Best
description: A returning war veteran loses his family to a violent home invasion and decides to seek and retaliate against those responsible.

name: Psycho II
description: After twenty-two years of psychiatric care, Norman Bates attempts to return to a life of solitude, but the specters of his crimes - and his mother - continue to haunt him.

name: Hangman
description: A homicide detective brings his partner out of retirement to help catch a serial killer whose crimes are based on the children's game Hangman.

name: Ghost Dog: The Way of the Samurai
description: An African-American Mafia hit man who models himself after the samurai of old finds himself targeted for death by the mob.

name: Spiral
description: Follows criminal investigations in Paris from all the different points of view of those involved.

name: Interrogation
description: A non-linear crime series that is centered around an interrogation of people who might be involved in a decades-old murder case.

name: The Adderall Diaries
description: Elliot, a troubled former successful writer decides to write about a missing wife and the following murder trial of her husband.

name: The Rover
description: 10 years after a global economic collapse, a hardened loner pursues the men who stole his only possession, his car. Along the way, he captures one of the thieves' brother, and the duo form an uneasy bond during the dangerous journey.

name: The Investigation
description: Copenhagen Police's Homicide unit, headed by Jens Møller, tries to solve the murder of Swedish journalist Kim Wall.

name: American Murder: The Family Next Door
description: In 2018, 34-year-old Shanann Watts and her two young daughters disappear in Colorado. With the heartbreaking details emerging, the family's story made headlines around the world.

name: Cops
stars_name: Ruben Barela,Andrew Fincher,Alex Cox,Heather Ashley Chase
description: Camera crews follow police officers while they work.

name: Juvenile Justice
description: A prickly judge who despises juvenile criminals arrives at a juvenile court, where she takes on a complex role examining punishment for young offenders.

name: The Driver
description: A getaway driver becomes the latest assignment for a tenacious detective.

name: Dragnet
description: The equally-straight-laced and "by the book" nephew of Joe Friday must work with his more laid-back partner to solve a mystery.

name: Street Fighter: The Legend of Chun-Li
stars_name: Kristin Kreuk,Neal McDonough,Michael Clarke Duncan,Chris Klein
description: When a teenager, Chun-Li witnesses the kidnapping of her father by wealthy crime lord M. Bison. When she grows up, she goes into a quest for vengeance and becomes the famous crime-fighter of the Street Fighter universe.

name: Wallander
description: A Swedish cop in a small town by the Baltic coast.

name: Lizzie
description: A psychological thriller based on the infamous 1892 murders of Lizzie Andrew Borden's family.

name: Starred Up
description: Eric Love, 19, is locked up in prison. On his first day, he assaults another inmate and several guards. He's offered group therapy and his dad, an inmate as well, tries to talk sense into him. Can he be rehabilitated?

name: Hard Boiled
stars_name: Chow Yun-Fat,Tony Chiu-Wai Leung,Teresa Mo,Philip Chan
description: A tough-as-nails cop teams up with an undercover agent to shut down a sinister mobster and his crew.

name: A Prophet
description: A young Algerian man is sent to a French prison.

name: Cesur Ve Güzel
description: Cesur returns to his father's village with an elaborate plan to avenge the death of his father. The only thing he hadn't planned for is Suhan, the daughter of the man he believes is responsible for his father's murder.

name: The Pale Horse
description: Is a trio of witches responsible for a series of sudden deaths or is there a rational explanation?

name: The Bletchley Circle
stars_name: Rachael Stirling,Julie Graham,Sophie Rundle,Anna Maxwell Martin
description: In 1952, four women who worked at the wartime code-breaking centre, Bletchley Park, reunite to track down a serial killer.

name: Brothers by Blood
description: A tale of family, friendships and betrayal in the violent world of the Philadelphia mob.

name: Thomasine & Bushrod
description: The exploits of 1910's bounty hunter Thomasine and bandit Bushrod, who, after rekindling their old romance, take to robbing banks in order to survive, stealing from rich whites and sharing their loot with the poor on the harsh frontier.

name: Agneepath

description: A young boy's father is lynched before his eyes; fifteen years later he returns home for revenge.

name: Bancroft
description: A dark thriller surrounding Elizabeth Bancroft, a senior detective with explosive secrets.

name: Lucky Man
description: From the mind of comic book legend Stan Lee comes a bold new action crime series about a brilliant but flawed police officer with the power to control luck.

name: Ironside
description: Wheelchair-bound detective Robert T. Ironside battles the bad guys on the streets of San Francisco.

name: SuperFly
stars_name: Trevor Jackson,Jason Mitchell,Lex Scott Davis,Michael Kenneth Williams

name: 88 Minutes

name: Jimmy Savile: A British Horror Story

description: After six years of keeping our malls safe, Paul Blart has earned a well-deserved vacation. He heads to Las Vegas with his teenage daughter before she heads off to college. But safety never takes a holiday and when duty calls, Blart answers.

name: Kidnap
description: A mother stops at nothing to recover her kidnapped son.

name: Rebecka Martinsson
description: When a childhood friend suddenly dies Rebecka Martinsson returns home to the north of Kiruna. But not everything is what it seems.

name: Bachchhan Paandey
description: When a struggling filmmaker and actor set out to make a biography on one of the most dreaded gangsters, they have little idea about just how crazy and dangerous it's going to be.

name: Don Matteo

description: Lives of three siblings are disrupted when their recently widowed mother declares she's in love with a new man. Tangled web of secrets, lies, rivalries and betrayals eventually leads to a murder.

name: True Crime

name: Lift

name: The Proposition

name: In Cold Blood

name: Scooby-Doo and Guess Who?
description: Scooby-Doo and the Mystery Inc. gang solve more mysteries together, each time with a different living, late or fictional celebrity guest.

name: Catch the Fair One

name: Tekken

description: Jin Kazama witnesses the death of his mother Jun by Tekken in the slums known as Anvil. After finding a Tekken ID he decides to seek out vengeance for his mother's death.

name: Imma Tataranni - Deputy Prosecutor
stars_name: Vanessa Scalera,Alessio Lapice,Barbara Ronchi,Carlo Luca De Ruggieri
description: Imma Tataranni is a deputy prosecutor with a prodigious memory, accustomed to solving cases using unorthodox methods.

name: The Keepers
stars_name: Gemma Hoskins,Abbie Schaub,Virginia Anzengruber,Jean Hargadon Wehner

name: The Stranger
description: Two men who meet on a plane and strike up a conversation that turns into friendship. For Henry Teague, worn down by a lifetime of physical labour and crime, this is a dream come true.

name: Extreme Prejudice
stars_name: Nick Nolte,Powers Boothe,Michael Ironside,Maria Conchita Alonso
description: A Texas Ranger and a ruthless narcotics kingpin - they were childhood friends, now they are adversaries...

name: Alleyn Mysteries
description: Drawing on her love of theatre and art, New Zealand author Ngaio Marsh created elegant crime-puzzlers full of quirky characters with hidden agendas, all brought meticulously to life in this BBC series.

name: Silk Road
description: Philosophical twenty-something Ross Ulbricht creates Silk Road, a dark net website that sells drugs, while DEA agent Rick Bowden goes undercover to bring him down.

name: Scarface
description: An ambitious and nearly insane violent gangster climbs the ladder of success in the mob, but his weaknesses prove to be his downfall.

name: Wild Things 2
description: Sequel to the hot film Wild Things, Wild Things 2 sees teenage bad girls Maya and Britney go on a sex and killing spree to win millions.

name: Going Places

name: Human Target

description: A unique bodyguard protects his clients by secretly infiltrating their lives in order to draw out and eliminate threats.

name: Another 48 Hrs.

name: The Whistleblower
description: A drama based on the experiences of Kathryn Bolkovac, a Nebraska cop who served as a peacekeeper in post-war Bosnia and outed the U.N. for covering up a sex trafficking scandal.

name: Gator
description: Agents force a former con man to help them nab a corrupt politician.

name: National Security
description: Two mismatched security guards are thrown together to bust a smuggling operation.

name: Darkness: Those Who Kill
stars_name: Natalie Madueño,Kenneth M. Christensen,Tobias Santelmann,Signe Egholm Olsen
description: Investigator Jan and profiler Louise constantly move around in the thrilling periphery of a murderer's view as they link a series of killings.

name: Pie in the Sky

name: The ABC Murders

name: Slice
stars_name: Zazie Beetz,Chance the Rapper,Rae Gray,Tim Decker
description: When a pizza delivery driver is murdered on the job, the city searches for someone to blame: Ghosts? Drug dealers? A disgraced werewolf?

name: The Killing Gene
description: A calculating killer coerces a detective to pay for his previous mistakes.

name: Kidnapping Mr. Heineken
description: The inside story of the planning, execution, rousing aftermath, and ultimate downfall of the kidnappers of beer tycoon Alfred "Freddy" Heineken in 1983, which resulted in the largest ransom ever paid for an individual.

name: District B13

name: Black
description: A man possessed by death. A woman who can see death. The earthly and the afterworld collide dangerously.

name: The 39 Steps
description: A man in London tries to help a counter-espionage agent, but when the agent is killed and the man stands accused, he must go on the run to save himself and stop a spy ring that is trying to steal top-secret information.

name: The Last Days of American Crime

name: Dark Crimes
description: A murder investigation of a slain businessman turns to clues found in an author's book about an eerily similar crime. Based on the 2008 article "True Crimes - A Postmodern Murder Mystery" by David Grann.

name: Paradise Lost: The Child Murders at Robin Hood Hills
description: A horrific triple child murder leads to an indictment and trial of three nonconformist boys based on questionable evidence.

name: Cowboy Bebop: The Movie
description: A terrorist explosion releases a deadly virus on the masses, and it's up the bounty-hunting Bebop crew to catch the cold-blooded culprit.
A naive young man assumes a dead man's identity and finds himself embroiled in an underground world of power, violence, and chance where men gamble behind closed doors on the lives of other men.

name: The Curse
description: Comedy crime caper set in London in the early 1980s, following a gang of hopeless small time crooks who through their own stupidity and poor judgement find themselves embroiled in one of the biggest gold heists in history.

name: Women's Murder Club
description: A homicide detective, a medical examiner, a newspaper reporter and a young assistant district attorney work together to solve homicide investigations.

name: Very Bad Things
description: A prostitute is killed during a bachelor party and the attendees turn on each other as the wedding approaches.

name: The Limehouse Golem
description: In Victorian London, a Scotland Yard inspector hunts down the sadistic killer behind a series of gory, Jack the Ripper-Like murders.

name: A Brighter Summer Day
description: Based on a true story, primarily on a conflict between two youth gangs, a 14-year-old boy's girlfriend conflicts with the head of one gang for an unclear reason, until finally the conflict comes to a violent climax.

name: Anxious People
description: A failed bank robber locks himself in a home, along with a real estate agent, two IKEA addicts, a pregnant woman, a suicidal millionaire and a rabbit.

name: Cypher
stars_name: Martin Dingle Wall,Brian Krause,Eve Mauro,Jaclyn Hales
description: Will Scott, one of the FBI's leading crypto-analysts is hired to crack a heavily coded document. He soon discovers it's a hit list, putting him in the cross-hairs of the bad guys who want it back.

name: Vantage Point
description: The attempted assassination of the American President is told and re-told from several different perspectives.

name: The One
description: Love -- and lies -- spiral when a DNA researcher helps discover a way to find the perfect partner, and creates a bold new matchmaking service.

name: Cartels
stars_name: Steven Seagal,Luke Goss,Georges St-Pierre,Darren E. Scott
description: A drug lord is captured and held "secretly" by 6 US agents at a hotel in Constanta, Romania. He agreed to testify against others in the drug business. They send lots of armed men to the hotel. Lots of shooting follows.

name: Alice, Sweet Alice
stars_name: Linda Miller,Mildred Clinton,Paula E. Sheppard,Niles McMaster
description: In 1961, a divorced Catholic couple's life is turned upside down when one of their two adolescent daughters is suspected of her younger sister's brutal murder during her first holy communion and a series of subsequent stabbings.

name: Suzhal
description: Add a Plot

name: The Last Mercenary
stars_name: Jean-Claude Van Damme,Alban Ivanov,Samir Decazza,Assa Sylla
description: A mysterious former secret service agent must urgently return to France when his estranged son is falsely accused of arms and drug trafficking by the government, following a blunder by an overzealous bureaucrat and a mafia operation.

name: These Black Black Eyes
stars_name: Shweta Tripathi,Anchal Singh,Saurabh Shukla,Tahir Raj Bhasin
description: Aggressively pursued by a politician's daughter who will do anything to marry him, a small-town man takes drastic measures to reclaim his life.

name: I'm Your Woman
stars_name: Rachel Brosnahan,Marsha Stephanie Blake,Arinzé Kene,Jameson Charles
description: In this 1970s set crime drama, a woman is forced to go on the run after her husband betrays his partners, sending her and her baby on a dangerous journey.

name: Super Troopers 2
description: When a border dispute arises between the U.S. and Canada, the Super Troopers are tasked with establishing a Highway Patrol station in the disputed area.

name: Rebel
stars_name: Katey Sagal,John Corbett,Lex Scott Davis,Tamala Jones
description: Follows a legal advocate with a blue collar background, who helps those in need without a law degree.

name: Bonnie & Clyde
description: Based on the true story of Clyde Barrow, a charismatic convicted armed robber who sweeps Bonnie Parker, an impressionable, petite, small-town waitress, off her feet, and the two embark on ...                See full summary »

name: The Lovebirds
description: A couple (Issa Rae and Kumail Nanjiani) experiences a defining moment in their relationship when they are unintentionally embroiled in a murder mystery.

name: The Billion Dollar Code
description: In 1990s Berlin, an artist and a hacker invented a new way to see the world. Years later, they reunite to sue Google for patent infringement on it.

name: Most Wanted
stars_name: Antoine Olivier Pilon,Josh Hartnett,Stephen McHattie,Jim Gaffigan
description: In 1989, a Canadian journalist investigates the circumstances surrounding the suspicious arrest of a heroin addict imprisoned in a Thai jail.

name: Cure
description: A frustrated detective deals with the case of several gruesome murders committed by people who have no recollection of what they've done.

name: Proud Mary
stars_name: Taraji P. Henson,Billy Brown,Jahi Di'Allo Winston,Neal McDonough
description: Mary is a hit woman working for an organized crime family in Boston, whose life is completely turned around when she meets a young boy whose path she crosses when a professional hit goes bad.

name: Rise of the Footsoldier: Origins
description: The origin story of how Tucker, Rolfie, and Pat Tate unite to form their own firm.

name: Belly
description: Two young friends involved in organized crime and drug dealing find that their priorities differ.

name: Shaft's Big Score!
stars_name: Richard Roundtree,Moses Gunn,Drew Bundini Brown,Joseph Mascolo
description: Shaft is back to find the murderer of an old friend on the cold hard city streets with a little help from his new friends.

name: The Big Boss
description: A young man sworn to an oath of non-violence works with his cousins in an ice factory where they mysteriously begin to disappear.

name: Sick Note
description: When Daniel Glass is misdiagnosed with a fatal disease he begins to notice how everyone around him treats him better, so he decides to keep pretending that he really is sick. This leads to more lies, and, eventually, crimes.

name: Headhunters

name: We Have Your Husband

name: Legends

name: The Hitcher
